title: Expose monitoring metrics for rate-limits and validation failures
description: Add lightweight metrics counters (e.g., prom-client or Fastify metrics) to packages/cli to expose rate-limit hits, rate-limit blocks, and validation failure counts at /metrics. Provide config toggles and tests verifying metrics increment.
cancellationReason: Monitoring branch was discarded per request; implementation deferred or moved to backlog.
acceptanceCriteria: An endpoint /metrics exposes counters for rate_limit_hits, rate_limit_blocks, and validation_failures; counters increment when those events occur (verified by unit/integration tests).
